objects.description: [Tonto Team](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0131) has exploited Microsoft vulnerabilities, including CVE-2018-8174, CVE-2018-0802, and CVE-2017-11882, as well as other vulnerabilities such as CVE-2019-9489 and CVE-2020-8468, to enable execution of their delivered malicious payloads.(Citation: Kaspersky CactusPete Aug 2020)(Citation: TrendMicro Tonto Team October 2020)

external_references.description: Zykov, K. (2020, August 13). CactusPete APT group’s updated Bisonal backdoor. Retrieved May 5, 2021.
Daniel Lughi, Jaromir Horejsi. (2020, October 2). Tonto Team - Exploring the TTPs of an advanced threat actor operating a large infrastructure. Retrieved October 17, 2021.
